PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_DuctSegmentPHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Duct segment performance history common attributes.

PropertyDef.Name: LossCoefficient
PropertyDef.Definition: Dimensionless loss coefficient used for calculating fluid resistance representing the ratio of total pressure loss to velocity pressure at a referenced cross-section.

PropertyDef.Name: LeakageCurveHistory
PropertyDef.Definition: Leakage per unit length curve versus working pressure. If a scalar is expressed then it represents LeakageClass which is flowrate per unit area at a specified pressure rating (e.g., ASHRAE Fundamentals 2001 34.16.).
